ygData.msgSnippet: But notice, most people here can t quite go to Lower Guk right now :)  So this mace wll have to wait a bit for most of us Allsar Olath`Vlos - Rathe ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
But notice, most people here can't quite go to Lower Guk right now :) So
this mace wll have to wait a bit for most of us
Allsar Olath`Vlos - Rathe
-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Robinson <bigsexxyryan@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, June 04, 1999 12:43 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] 1 Handed Magic Weapons


>From: Ryan Robinson <bigsexxyryan@...>
>
>
>
>
>>From: "Heather M. Daley" <blushn@...>
>>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] 1 Handed Magic Weapons
>>Date: Fri, 14 May 1999 10:28:17 -0400
>>
>>From: "Heather M. Daley" <blushn@...>
>>
>>Hi again,
>>
>>As this Emameled Black Mace is new to me can you tell me if this is a
quest
>>item or if it is an item dropped by a certain beast? I do not know anyone
>>with it so I am a bit curious on how to aquire it.
>>
>>Lady Bree Nightingale of Mercenaries of Doom
>>27th circle
>>Fennin Ro
>
>
>The Mace is a normal weapon that can be found in lower Guk off a level 40+
>mob. I can not remember the name off the mob but the chances of getting
this
>mace is right up there with JBOOTS & Black Iron Crown. My buddies camped
>Lower guk for 5 days straight and only got 1, so it pretty rare. This
weapon
>is awesome, i am doing 18 damage once in a while because my 1handed skill
is
>going up fast, over 130 now, not to mention that it has a speed of 28 which
>kicks and 1 handed blunt i have seen by far. If anyone has anymore
questions
>please ask.
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Have you entered ONElist's "Grow to Give" program?
>http://www.onelist.com
>Deadline is June 19. Join now to win $5000 for your charity of choice.
